post_text: August 29, 2018 at 12:23â€¯AM#1So I have multiple macros that help with pre programming and I'm trying to develop one that when the name of the cue is[color=#FF0000]Follow[/color]the macro will change the trig type to follow and ask for a trig time.I tried a few things like [color=#FF33CC][$selectedexeccue /name=="Follow"][/color] but that didn't work.Any ideas?Peyton
title: Weird Macro Conditional Expression
